languages.text: {n}Мейв вскрикивает от ужаса и тут же зажимает рот обеими ладонями, силясь запереть собственный голос внутри.{/n}
{n}Maive cries out in horror and immediately clasps her mouth with both hands, trying to lock her voice inside.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мейв вскрикивает от ужаса и тут же зажимает рот обеими ладонями, силясь запереть собственный голос внутри.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive cries out in horror and immediately clasps her mouth with both hands, trying to lock her own voice inside.{/n}

languages.text: {n}梅芙惊恐地尖叫起来，随后立刻用双手捂住嘴巴，试图压抑住自己的声音。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive cries out in horror and immediately clasps her mouth with both hands, trying to lock her voice inside.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙惊恐地尖叫起来，随后立刻用双手捂住嘴巴，试图压抑住自己的声音。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive grita horrorizada e inmediatamente se tapa la boca con ambas manos en un intento por contener la voz.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive grita horrorizada e inmediatamente se tapa la boca con ambas manos en un intento por contener la voz.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive, dehşetle bağırıp sonrasında sesini tutabilmek için iki eliyle ağzını kapatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive cries out in horror and immediately clasps her mouth with both hands, trying to lock her voice inside.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive, dehşetle bağırıp sonrasında sesini tutabilmek için iki eliyle ağzını kapatıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}メイヴは恐怖のあまり叫び声を上げ、すぐに両手で口を押さえて声を抑えようとする。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Maive cries out in horror and immediately clasps her mouth with both hands, trying to lock her voice inside.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}メイヴは恐怖のあまり叫び声を上げ、すぐに両手で口を押さえて声を抑えようとする。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive s'exclame avec horreur et porte aussitôt ses deux mains à sa bouche afin de ravaler le hurlement qui menace de lui échapper.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maive schreit entsetzt auf und schlägt sich augenblicklich beide Hände vor den Mund, als wolle sie ihre Stimme zurückhalten.{/n}
